page.title: 14FASHION IN 1985
page.content: Fashion now for young people is either baggy trousers or tight black leather trousers. Many teenagers have tinted, streaked or even completely dyed hair, either spiked, wetted down or fluffed up. Fluorescent clothing is now in fashion for the younger generation, particularly gloves or socks. Baggy jumpers are also very fashionable.Mini-skirts, ripped T-shirts, studs, steel-toed boots, chains,and punk hairstyles are usually an unemployed girl teenager's clothes. For a teenage boy it is often a punk hairstyle, studded jacket, chains, tight leather trousers and steel-toed boots.
